DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics weekly dose zicronapine , compare daily dose zicronapine .
DOC.brief_title: Study Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Once Weekly Zicronapine Patients With Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: The study include 2 treatment period . The open-label run-in period begin patient enrolment continue 3 week , patient receive daily treatment zicronapine . The double-blind period begin patient randomization continue 5 week , patient assign one group receive daily treatment zicronapine 3 group receive weekly treatment zicronapine .
